title: WannaWatch
description: A full-stack Android application that allows the user to track their watched movies & TV shows, and see statistics based on their watching habits.

title: Record Shop
description: A full-stack CRUD Android application that displays album data from a back-end API.

title: Timewise - Productivity
description: A React front-end web app designed for peak productivity, featuring a Pomodoro timer, seamless note capture, and a robust calendar function.

title: Travel Wizard - Journey Planner
description: Travel planner web application, designed to provide solo travellers with a list of optimally priced suggestions and historic weather data for their travel destination

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Web application allowing the user to view a five-day weather forecast for one location at a time.

title: Daily Scheduler
description: Web application allowing the user to organise their work day.

title: README Generator
description: Comand line program that writes a custom README file based on user input.

title: JavaScript Quiz
description: A short multiple-choice timed quiz, testing the user's basic knowledge of the programming language.
